external_games.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Arcade Attack
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Arcade Attack

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Arcade Attack
storyline: The game's plot seems to come sometime after TMNT: Back to the Sewer's conclusion, although there are some slight inconsistencies which prevent it from being canon to the show. Cyber Shredder has returned, this time in the distant future. He has sent a Golden Cyber Foot back to the past to test a time travel device. The Turtles then go off on an adventure to stop Cyber Shredder from reaching the present. Along the way, they topple many Purple Dragons, Foot Ninja, and some well-known TMNT villains. All of the games cut-scenes were written by Sam Regal who also voices Donatello.
summary: This side-scrolling beat-em-up game is a tribute to the coin-op classics that made the Turtles video game legends. The Turtles make their return to clean up the crime-riddled streets of NYC. Shredder stands poised to take over the city - and only you can rally the might of the ninja brothers to put a stop to the threat in the present and the future...
